argumentsAndDecisions.complaintSummary: Landlord failed to register property with Rent Stabilization Program and imposed unlawful rent increases
argumentsAndDecisions.respondentHadNotice: Yes, city provided notice regarding compliance requirements
argumentsAndDecisions.evidenceAssessment: Respondent did not contest any factual statements by Petitioner and failed to register property until after petition was filed
argumentsAndDecisions.impactAssessment: Multiple invalid rent increases resulted in tenant overpayments

petitions.respondent: Francisco Cervantes aka Frank Cervantes for Cervantes, LLC
